702070.name: ASCII Wars
702070.description:
Protect the servers.
Locate the vulnerabilities.
Exterminate the viruses.

This fast paced strategy game lets you enter terminal commands from a VR control panel interface to defeat the viruses before you become overrun and the weapons facility falls to the dark unseen powers.

Featuring:
-8 servers to administer
-12 powerful commands with 3 variations of each too protect your servers
-Countless viruses and variations to exterminate

Easy to learn and play. Challenges for both the casual gamer and the serious gamer. Get this unique VR game at roomscale with no teleportation needed.

Are you up for the challenge?
702070.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
